properties.name: Innovation Brew Works
properties.description: Innovation Brew Works offers fresh, made-to-order pizzas, sandwiches, salads, and desserts. Beers produced at Innovation Brew Works are original recipes made with ingredients grown on the Cal Poly Pomona campus. All beers are named after Cal Poly Pomona and Pomona Valley historical figures and places.  909.869.2925

properties.name: Subway
properties.description: The combination of fiber, complex carbohydrates, protein, minerals, and vitamins make Subway's low-fat sandwiches ideal for customers looking to make balanced food choices. Begin with your choice of bread, fresh baked daily right here in our restaurant, topped with fresh meats, cheeses, and vegetables. We also offer salads that are equal to five servings of vegetables.  909.869.6751

properties.name: Qdoba
properties.description: Qdoba Mexican Grill is a Mexican kitchen where anyone can come to enjoy a fresh, handcrafted meal prepared right in front of them. Qdoba showcases food that celebrates its passion for high-quality ingredients, a menu full of innovative flavors, handcrafted preparation and inviting service.  909.869.6751

properties.name: Starbucks
properties.description: Starbucks at the University Library serves up your favorite gourmet coffee, espressos, lattes, and seasonal beverages. The Starbucks menu includes hot breakfast favorites, bakery items, yogurt parfaits, fruit medleys, and a variety of sandwiches.  909.869.4744

properties.name: Pony Express - CBA
properties.description: Pony Express is a convenience store with a wide variety of grab-n-go items, including sandwiches, sushi, beverages, and other snacks. School supplies, health and beauty aids, and various other personal items are also sold at Pony Express.  909.979.6004

properties.name: Pony Express - CLA
properties.description: Pony Express is a convenience store with a wide variety of grab-n-go items, including sandwiches, sushi, beverages, and other snacks. School supplies, health and beauty aids, and various other personal items are also sold at Pony Express.  909.869.6928

properties.name: H-Cafe
properties.description: H Café is a small convenience store serving grab-and-go snacks, beverages, and self-serve Starbucks coffee.  909.869.6928

properties.name: Kellogg West Dining
properties.description: Kellogg West offers a spacious dining room for breakfast, lunch, and dinner (reservations required) as well as catering for any campus meeting or event. Call for Hours.  909.869.2222

properties.name: Fresh Escapes
properties.description: Fresh Escape offers an array of fresh vegetables and toppings to create a delicious custom-made salad. Gluten-free pita pizzas, oven-baked potatoes, bread bowls with home-style soups or chili, and seasonal fresh fruits are also available.  909-869-5269

properties.name: International Grounds
properties.description: International Grounds offers the "We Proudly Serve" Starbucks concept, which is an abridged version of Starbucks' most popular hot and cold beverages, including five Frappuccino flavors. Fresh baked goods, such as muffins and bagels, are also available.  909.869.5377

properties.name: Round Table Pizza
properties.description: Round Table Pizza has always been known for quality ingredients. Our dough is rolled fresh each day. Our zesty red sauce is made from scratch with eleven herbs and spices and our three cheese blend is made with the best whole milk mozzarella, provolone and cheddar cheeses. Add juicy premium meats and fresh gourmet veggies on top of our World-class crust and you will have the best pizza in all the land.  909.869.5411

properties.name: Carl's Jr.
properties.description: Carl's Jr. features items such as charbroiled hamburgers, chicken sandwiches, turkey burgers, fish sandwiches, French fries, fresh salads, and breakfast items.  909.869.5269

properties.name: Farm Store
properties.description: The Farm Store, located at AGRIscapes, features an enhanced line of products from the campus farm, orchards, and nursery.  909.869.4906

properties.name: Jamba Juice - BRIC
properties.description: With 2.5 to 3.5 servings of fruit in each drink, Jamba Juice smoothies are a healthy and tasty treat. Jamba Juice also offers all-natural baked goods, steel-cut oatmeal, sandwiches, and other delicious, healthy choices.  909.979.5740

properties.name: Hibachi San
properties.description: Hibachi-San is a blend of traditional Japanese food like teriyaki, tempura, and sushi and newer concepts such as poke bowls. Using only the freshest ingredients, Hibachi-San prepares all of its entrées on site and features mouthwatering original recipes.  909.869.4602

properties.name: Poly Fresh Market
properties.description: Poly Fresh makes it convenient for you to keep your commitment to eating healthy. From fresh fruit to salads, from Farm Store snacks to refreshing beverages, Poly Fresh provides numerous options for a healthy lifestyle.  909.869.2925

properties.name: Panda Express
properties.description: From world-famous orange chicken to delicious chow mein, Panda Express defines American-Chinese cuisine with bold flavors and fresh ingredients. Panda Express entrees and sides contain zero grams of trans fat per serving and adds no MSG in their food.  909.869.5099

properties.name: The Den
properties.description: Come in and you'll see that is not your dad's diner. This is a place with a vibe. Where you step right up to the counter and order a hand-smashed burger. For breakfast. Or a Grand Slamwich®. At midnight. This is the local hang-out where friends meet up to chow down. Whenever. Whyever. The look is lounge. The feel is easy-chair communal comfort zone. The menu is breakfast all-day, plus sandwiches, burritos, salads—all made the way we eat today. Saucy, spicy, slightly unruly, proudly old-schooley. (Hand-mixed shakes, anyone?) This is "The Den." The next milestone in American dining from the people who invented American dining.  909.869.2425

properties.name: Einstein Bros. Bagels
properties.description: Einstein Bros. Bagels is proud to provide our guests with freshly baked bagels, breakfast sandwiches, lunch sandwiches, salads, parfaits, smoothies, coffee, and catering. Stop on in!  909.979.6003

properties.name: Faculty Staff Cafe
properties.description: Faculty & Staff Café offers an array of fresh vegetables and toppings to create a delicious custom-made salad. Gluten-free pita pizzas, oven-baked potatoes, bread bowls with home-style soups or chili, and seasonal fresh fruits are also available.  909.869.6928

properties.name: Jamba Juice Express
properties.description: With 2.5 to 3.5 servings of fruit in each drink, Jamba Juice smoothies are a healthy and tasty treat. Jamba Juice also offers all-natural baked goods, steel-cut oatmeal, sandwiches, and other delicious, healthy choices.

properties.name: ENV Cafe
properties.description: Pair our fresh baked goodies with your favorite Starbucks coffee beverage. We offer sandwiches, pastries, beverages, and delicious snack items. We are located in building 7.  909.869.3592

properties.name: Pony Express - CCMP
properties.description: Pony Express is a convenience store with a wide variety of grab-n-go items, including sandwiches, sushi, beverages, and other snacks. School supplies, health and beauty aids, and various other personal items are also sold at Pony Express.  909.869.3186

properties.name: Peets/Freshens
properties.description: Peets - Since 1966, Peet's Coffee & Tea has offered superior coffees and teas by sourcing the best quality coffee beans and tea leaves in the world, and adhering to strict high quality and taste standards.  Freshëns truly delivers fuel for the body and mind. Freshëns smoothies are enriched with antioxidants, new fruits, invigorating vitamins and minerals, healthy omegas, and high energy recipes.  909.869.6751

properties.name: Vista Market
properties.description: We are a fully stocked, one-stop-shop neighborhood store with a fun community vibe that offers personal items and the staples needed to prepare home-cooked meals  909.869.5111

properties.name: Taco Bell
properties.description: From classic bean burritos to specialties, such as nacho cheese Doritos locos tacos, Taco Bell Express offers a variety of flavors to satisfy your craving. Live Más®!  909.869.2925
